 v2.2.04-04
 New Locations:
 Telfair County, GA
 Woods County, OK
 
 Location Fixes:
 Clermont County, OH
 
 General Fixes:
 Changes to make the Active911 location reporting more reliable when Cadpage is hidden by mapping app
 
 v2.2.04-03
 Location Fixes:
 Escambia County, FL
 Avoyelles Parish, LA
 Atlantic County, NJ
 Charleston County, SC
 Pierce County, WA
 
 v2.2.04-02
 Ability to report Active911 user locations has been restored, at least for now
 
 New Locations:

 Harrison County, TX
 
 Location Fixes:
 Escambia County, FL
 Prince Georges County, MD
 Newton County, MO
 Moniteau County, OK
 Morgan County, OK
 Charleston County, SC
 
 v2.2.04-01
 For Active911 users, this version looses the ability to reliably report your location to other Active911 users. Terribly sorry, but that is the price we have to pay to get this distributed in Google Play Store. Still working on finding a better solution.
